reg_mobile_message: Please provide your 10 digit registered mobile number to proceed
gustmessage: Thank you for choosing our hospital for your healthcare needs. We constantly work to improve and meet your expectations. To serve our patients better, kindly spare a few minutes to fill out this feedback form. Your opinion is of immense value to us.
detractor: Please describe reason for low rating
recommendationmessage: On a scale from 0-10, how likely are you to recommend this hospital to your friends or family members?
yourreason: Your reason for selecting our hospital
recognizeateam: Please help us recognize a staff member of our hospital who may have performed services beyond your expectations.
happythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
unhappythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
kpi_info: 40. PSQ3a - Percentage of POCT results which led to a clinical intervention for the month of
kpi_def: Point of care testing is defined as laboratory testing conducted close to the site of patient care, typically by non-lab personnel e.g. nurses, blood gases, electrolytes, troponin, and blood glucose..
formula_para1: Number of POCT tests which resulted in a clinical intervention where indicated
formula_para2: Number of POCT tests where clinical intervention was deemed necessary.
